title: HOW TO START A WORM FARM | DIY Worm Farm | Worm Farm Setup | Hey It's a Good Life

subtasks: Understanding what a worm farm is and its benefits
Gathering materials for the worm farm
Building the worm farm structure
Drilling holes for airflow and drainage
Assembling the worm bins
Setting up the bedding for the worms
Introducing worms and starting composting
Maintaining the worm farm
Discussing the impact of worm farming on the environment
Highlighting the compost benefits and pest control
Involving family and especially children in the process
